content: **gosari cardigan** gosari cardigan is a top-down raglan cardigan made in stockinette stitch gosari cardigan uses cotton slub yarn so the row gauge is very large if you use a different yarn than cotton slub be sure to check both the stitch count and row gauge before knitting start by casting on stitches at the neckline and increase as you knit separate the sleeves and put the sleeve stitches on hold then continue knitting the body finish the body with 1x1 ribbing the button band is knitted in the same direction as the body after knitting the sleeves that were put on hold finish the sleeves and neck band using the i-cord method since this follows the general construction of a top-down cardigan it should be easy to knit **gauge size needles information** needle 4 5 mm 4 0 mm yarn banul cotton slub yarn 300 g 1 ball = 100g/ 230m size bust circumstance 100 cm length 40 cm button 5 buttons 18 mm gauge 21 sts x 34 row = 10 cm x 10 cm in stockinette stitch on 4 5 mm needles **고사리가디건** gosari cardigan은 메리야스 편물의 탑다운 래글런 가디건입니다 슬라브 질감을 살려주는 베이직한 디자인이며 크롭하게 길이를 마무리하여 경쾌한 느낌의 반팔 가디건입니다 단수게이지가 큰 편인 코튼슬라브 실을 사용하였기 때문에 코튼슬라브 실이 아닌 다른 실을 사용하신다면 콧수뿐만 아니라 단수 게이지를 꼭 확인 후 떠주세요 일반적인 탑다운 가디건의 전개이니 쉽게 뜰 수 있을거에요 if you find an error with a pattern please contact me through my instagram @_berryknitting 1 or send a msg 1 https //instagram com/_berryknitting igshid=ogq5zdc2odk2za==
